title: Doctor Molar Bear, My Favourite Dentist
description: Leopold wants to be a scary lion with big, sharp teeth, but his last baby tooth just won't let go. It's time to visit his favourite dentist, Doctor Molar Bear. She is kind and gentle, but best of all, she lets Leopold press the buttons on her chair. Wheee!!With an array of fun characters and informative illustrations, this animal-filled story is sure to have your child smiling for their next dental visit.
author: Andi Makkar
